name: Jennifer Aniston Superfans
descriptions: JENNIFER ANISTON SUPERFANS presented by HOUSE OF KILLING feat Esben Holk, 2018 onwards.JENNIFER ANISTON SUPERFANS is an ongoing research project. It uses a preconceived fandom of Jennifer Aniston as basis for the continuous production and dissemination of semi real and unreal content. It becomes an intervention in algorithmic content redistribution: trolling the surveillance apparatus by subverting the search for meaning and adopting connotational cultural reference into the production of uncertainty. Jennifer Aniston as medium is invited to occupy digital space and to become, for a growing group of artists and other practitioners, the posthuman cyborgian hybrid of content, medium, platform and content generator. The superfans in the art project and on the facebook-group number almost 630 people, and include IRL art collaborations with work by Maansi Jain, Cara Lien, Sean Pinearo, Sophie Harkins and Jens Lovgren. With tarotcards, spiritual readings, lifecoaching, video, performance and installation: The superfans are creating mythology!
locations: The Church of Jennifer Aniston, w/ PrettyUgly, @Salon zur Wilde Renate, may 2018, Berlin.
The Revenge of Jennifer Aniston (the one where she kills Ross), w/ Venganza, @Riot Ipse, june 2018,Berlin
TedX: How to absorb the ontological uncertainty of Jennifer Aniston intoTM, performance @Gallery Panke, june 2018, Berlin
Jennifer Aniston Superfans solo, @Retramp Gallery, Berlin, february 2019.
-.- w/ FanFic Festival, curated by Virtual Theater, @Ballhaus Ost, Berlin March 2019.
-.- w/ Fanfiction, curated by Bad Art Presents, @Dog & Bone, London, March 2019.
Jennifer Aniston Superfans Tarot Reading @ IHEARTBERLIN, december 2019, Bikini Berlin
UPCOMING: Jennifer Aniston Superfans Livestream w/ BLA CONNECT, curated by Robert Sakrowski, june 2020 Los Angeles

name: waiting 4 content
descriptions: video created for Brunno Silvas curational project and -residency: Parralel Screens

name: CLUB TROPICANA
descriptions: curational project w/ Maansi Jain, featuring Anastasia Muna and Geovanna Gonzalez, Anto Azzopardi, Bad Art Presents: Anna Chotova and Thomas Coates, Clusterduck, Francesco Petruccelli, Hedda Grevle Ottesen, House of Killing feat Esben Holk, Hugo Hutchins, Ida Dorthea Thorrud, Maansi Jain and Lemia Monet. Tunes by NO SHADE’s Grinderteeth (Veslemøy Rustad Holseter), Perifaflex (Nat Assia), Folly Ghost (Tres Folly) with support by Samuel Gieben, Camilla Rae Lutz and Tarrou (Jean-Baptiste Gallon)

name: Find Me in the Toilet @ Parties
descriptions: browserbased video interaction created for online exhibition MakeURLself@Home curated by Clusterduck with Hannah Neckel, invited by David Quiles Guillo
